aboutme.headline: About me
aboutme.text: Hey there, I'm Johannes. I just completed my training as a frontend developer and love creating creative and high-performance web solutions. Every challenge inspires me to find more efficient and elegant solutions. Let's build something great together!

skills.headline: Skill set
skills.introduction: I am a dedicated frontend developer with a passion for modern web technologies. Always open to learning, I quickly adapt to new challenges. See for yourself what I can do!

projects.headline: Projects
projects.introduction: Feel free to check out my projects and interact with them. I focus on user-friendly, responsive designs and efficient code.

singeproject.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
